templates.name: Styled H1
templates.content: {{selectedText}}

templates.name: YellowBgText
templates.content: <font style="background-color: #FFFACD; color:{{color}}; padding: 4px; border-radius: 8px; text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); font-weight: bold;">{{selectedText}}</font>

templates.name: RedBgText
templates.content: <font style="background-color:tomato; color:white; padding:4px; text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);font-weight: bold;">{{selectedText}}</font>
